bookSourceComment:
把AO3的作品下载到本地，自动导入阅读。
使用之前务必：
1、先登录
2、把AO3账号设置为阅读成人向作品时不发出预警（具体怎么做，嗷3有中文教程，自己找）
有以上两点要求纯粹是因为我太菜了，解决不了成人分级作品不按procced就看不了的问题orz
P.S.看AO3要魔法这件事不用我说吧？

https://h.x360xs.com/index.php?m=user/login
理论上不需要登陆的
/*legado&&coolapk by:
xsw8093*/

ruleContent.content:
<js>
 var arr=title;
 var srt=title.replace(/ /g,"");
 var sft=title.replace(/第.*?章./g,"第.*?");
 var sfc=sft.replace(/$/g,".*?页");
 var sfn=sft.replace(/$/g,".*?继续阅读。");
 var srf=title.replace(/ /g,"　");
 var fdr=title.replace(/[0-9]+[\s|\u3000]/g,"");
 var dff=src.replace(new RegExp(arr,"g"),"");
 var dfc=dff.replace(new RegExp("\n.{1,7}"+fdr,"g"),"");
 result=dfc.replace(new RegExp(srf,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(srt,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(sfn,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(sfc,"g"),"");
</js>
class.chapter@html
##本章由熱門小說網\(\.Remenxs\.\)提供免費閱讀！|（第[0-9]页）
ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
##\_\_\_XSXSXS\|[0-9]+\|book\|([0-9a-zA-Z\-\_\/+]{6,30})\|x360xs##\/$1###
<js>
let bookId=baseUrl.replace("https://h.x360xs.com/book/","").split("/")[0];
let arr= "https://h.x360xs.com/book/"+bookId+"/"
var srt=result
result=arr + srt + '.html';
</js>
ruleContent.replaceRegex:
##　+（第[0-9]页）
|（本章节完结）[\s\S]*|
　{2}（本章节未完结，点击下一页翻页继续阅读）
　{2}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
page=java.getElement("@@class.pagination@a.0@b.1");
var ys = String(page).match(/\d+/);
var list = [{text:'第1页',href:baseUrl}];
if(ys>=2){
for(var i=2;i<=ys;i++){
var url = baseUrl.replace(/.html/,'')
var html = url+'_'+i+'.html';
list.push({text:'第'+i+'页',href:html});
}}
list;
</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

bookSourceComment:
搜索不到时可以尝试以下格式搜索
##完整书名
点击登录自定义发现
更改过发现要刷新本书源才会生效
❗️注意事项:
1、请不要退出晋江app的账号，只要点了退出，或者在其他地方登录了，都要重新抓token
2、更新token，书籍就要更新目录
loginUrl:
<js>
//请不要改书源的任何地方，请点击“登录”后再填写

function getToast(){
	java.toast("用来看的，别点了，确认请点右上角的✓")
	};
	
function login(){
	Map = source.getLoginInfoMap();
	Map == (Map == null||Map=="")?{}:Map
	let token = Map.get("登录请在这里填写app的token");
	token = (token==""||token==null)?"":token;
	java.log(token);
	
	let fl = Map.get("填写需要开启的分类序号（如2,4,5【默认为9,10】）");
	fl = (fl==""||fl==null)?"9,10":fl;
	java.log(fl);

ruleContent.content:
function decode(){ let v43,v38,dest; let respose = java.get(baseUrl,{"User-Agent": "Dalvik/2.1.0"}); let accesskey = String(respose.header("accesskey")); let keyString = String(respose.header("keystring")); let content = String(respose.body()); let accesskeyLen = accesskey.length; let v9 =0; let v6 = String(accesskey[accesskeyLen-1]).charCodeAt(); for(i=0;i v18){ v43 = keyString.substring(v15,(v18-v15)+v15) }else{ v43 = keyString.substring(v15,v17+v15) } let v32 = content.length; if((v6 & 1)!=0){ v38 = content.substring(v32-12,v32) dest = content.substring(0,v32-12) }else{ v38 = content.substring(0,12); dest = content.substring(12,content.length); } let key = java.md5Encode(v43+v38).substring(0,8); let iv = java.md5Encode(v38).substring(0,8); content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String(key), String(iv)).decryptStr(dest); return content } if(/jjwxc/.test(baseUrl)){ intro=String(java.get("intro1")).replace(/\s/g,''); /"content"/.test(result)?java.setContent(result):java.setContent(decode()); intro=intro!=""?"◎"+intro+"◎
":""; content=java.getString("$..content"); saybody=java.getString("$..sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n【📢作者有话说】\n"+saybody:""; if(/token/.test(baseUrl)){ vipc=String(content).length > 30?java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String("KW8Dvm2N"), String("1ae2c94b")).decryptStr(content):java.getString("$..message")+"\n登录后请更新目录，刷新正文"; result=intro+String(vipc+say); }else{ result=intro+content+say } }else{ result="" } //评论开启 let bbb = book.getVariable("custom") let sss=source.getVariable() if(/评论/.test(bbb) || /评论/.test(sss)){ let commentNum =/评论/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]:sss.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]; if(/chapterContent/.test(baseUrl)){ commentUrl = baseUrl.replace(/androidapi/,'comment').replace(/chapterContent/,'getCommentList')+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0"; }else if(/androidChapterBatchDownload/.test(baseUrl)){ body = baseUrl.match(/body":"(.*?)"/)[1]; commentUrl = "https://app.jjwxc.org/comment/getCommentList?"+body+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0&commentSort=0" } comment = JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentUrl)); cflag = comment.code == "200" ? true:false; ccflag = comment.code == undefined ? true:false commentList = []; if(cflag || ccflag){ commentList =comment.commentList || comment.data.commentList ||[]; commentb = ""; }else{ commentb = comment.message } for(i=0;i ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*|获取正文失败[\s\S]+|◎\s+?◎

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;title=$.chaptername;title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');intro=$.chapterintro;vip=$.isvip!='0';lock=$.islock!='0';type=$.chaptertype=='1'?true:false;num=!type?$.chapterid+"  ☪ ":'';

bbb = book.getVariable("custom");sss = source.getVariable();
if(/去章节序号/.test(bbb) || /去章节序号/.test(sss)){
num=''
}
if(/章节名/.test(bbb) || /章节名/.test(sss)){
num=!type?"第"+$.chapterid+"章 ":'';
}
title=type?'📖 '+title+' 📖':title;
if( (/目录简介/.test(bbb) || /目录简介/.test(sss))&&!/📖/.test(title)){
	fu = /目录简介【(.*?)】/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/目录简介【(.*?)】/)[1]:sss.match(/目录简介【(.*?)】/)[1]
	title = title +fu+intro
	}else{
		java.put("intro1",intro);
		}
l=lock?'[此章节已锁]':'';
result=num+title+l;
</js>

variableComment:
1、书籍变量（当前书）
填写 [去章节序号] —— 去除章节序号
填写[章节名]  ——  变为第xx章 章节名

填写 [目录简介【符号】] —— 章节简介放到目录列表，正文不出现 符号：跟章节名连接时中间的符号，如 目录简介【 】，中间将为空格

填写 [评论+评论数量]——如 评论50  则可以显示50条评论，数量必填

填写 [开启购买/关闭购买]  —— 如 开启购买 则会开启自动购买下五章【确认以后点右上角三点刷新才会生效，使用完毕后最好删除，避免重复请求】

2、源变量（所有书）
同书籍变量

function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	if(args[2]!=undefined){num=args[2]}
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%"+url+"%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22{{(page-1)*25}}%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=148":url;
	 
 //try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="bq"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq='+url+'&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=3&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{String(source.getLoginHeader())}\}':u;
 u=tag=="lx"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=3&sd=0&lx='+url+'&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{String(source.getLoginHeader())}}':u
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

":""; content=java.getString("$..content"); saybody=java.getString("$..sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n【📢作者有话说】\n"+saybody:""; if(/token/.test(baseUrl)){ vipc=String(content).length > 30?java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String("KW8Dvm2N"), String("1ae2c94b")).decryptStr(content):java.getString("$..message")+"\n登录后请更新目录，刷新正文"; result=intro+String(vipc+say); }else{ result=intro+content+say } }else{ result="" } //评论开启 let bbb = book.getVariable("custom") let sss=source.getVariable() if(/评论/.test(bbb) || /评论/.test(sss)){ let commentNum =/评论/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]:sss.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]; if(/chapterContent/.test(baseUrl)){ commentUrl = baseUrl.replace(/androidapi/,'comment').replace(/chapterContent/,'getCommentList')+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0"; }else if(/androidChapterBatchDownload/.test(baseUrl)){ body = baseUrl.match(/body":"(.*?)"/)[1]; commentUrl = "https://app.jjwxc.org/comment/getCommentList?"+body+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0&commentSort=0" } comment = JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentUrl)); cflag = comment.code == "200" ? true:false; ccflag = comment.code == undefined ? true:false commentList = []; if(cflag || ccflag){ commentList =comment.commentList || comment.data.commentList ||[]; commentb = ""; }else{ commentb = comment.message } for(i=0;i ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*|获取正文失败[\s\S]+|◎\s+?◎

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;title=$.chaptername;title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');intro=$.chapterintro;vip=$.isvip!='0';lock=$.islock!='0';type=$.chaptertype=='1'?true:false;num=!type?$.chapterid+"  ☪ ":'';

bbb = book.getVariable("custom");sss = source.getVariable();
if(/去章节序号/.test(bbb) || /去章节序号/.test(sss)){
num=''
}
if(/章节名/.test(bbb) || /章节名/.test(sss)){
num=!type?"第"+$.chapterid+"章 ":'';
}
title=type?'📖 '+title+' 📖':title;
if( (/目录简介/.test(bbb) || /目录简介/.test(sss))&&!/📖/.test(title)){
	fu = /目录简介【(.*?)】/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/目录简介【(.*?)】/)[1]:sss.match(/目录简介【(.*?)】/)[1]
	title = title +fu+intro
	}else{
		java.put("intro1",intro);
		}
l=lock?'[此章节已锁]':'';
result=num+title+l;
</js>

variableComment:
1、书籍变量（当前书）
填写 [去章节序号] —— 去除章节序号
填写[章节名]  ——  变为第xx章 章节名

填写 [目录简介【符号】] —— 章节简介放到目录列表，正文不出现 符号：跟章节名连接时中间的符号，如 目录简介【 】，中间将为空格

填写 [评论+评论数量]——如 评论50  则可以显示50条评论，数量必填

填写 [开启购买/关闭购买]  —— 如 开启购买 则会开启自动购买下五章【确认以后点右上角三点刷新才会生效，使用完毕后最好删除，避免重复请求】

2、源变量（所有书）
同书籍变量

<js>
function headUrl(url){
    var count = url.split('/').length-1;
    var a=url.slice(23,url.indexOf('/',23));
     return 'https://www.hujuge.com/'+a+'/1/index.html';
}
java.setContent(result,null);
let a1=java.getElement('class.result c-container xpath-log new-pmd').toString().split('<div class="result c-container xpath-log new-pmd"').map(value => '<div class="result c-container xpath-log new-pmd"' + value);
let a2=java.getElement('class.result-op c-container xpath-log new-pmd').toString().split('<div class="result-op c-container xpath-log new-pmd"').map(value => '<div class="result-op c-container xpath-log new-pmd"' + value);
let a=a1.concat(a2);
java.log(a.length);
var b = [];
for (let i =0;i<a.length;i++) {
    var str =org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(a[i]);
    var list={};
    let realU=str.select('span.c-color-gray').text();
    if(!realU.includes('hujuge')){
        continue;
    }else{
        list["title"]=str.select('h3').select('a').text();
        java.log(list["title"]);
        list["author"]=str.select('span.c-font-normal c-color-gray2 article-span_UGCkY').text();
        java.log(list["author"]);
        list["intro"]=str.select('span.content-right_8Zs40').html();
        if(list["intro"]==null||list["intro"]==''){
         list["intro"]=str.select('span.text_2NOr6').html();
        }
        java.log(list["intro"]);
        list["url"]=str.select('div[mu]').attr('mu').toString();
        list["url"] =headUrl(list["url"]);
        java.log(list["url"]);
        b.push(list);
    }
}
b;
</js>

💡与“晋江APP端”发现互补，该源为web端发现
💡web版搜索，可搜索文章名、作者名、主角配角名和其它关键字里包含多个搜索词的文章，搜索词用中文逗号（，）隔开，默认不启用该源的搜索，启用发现
💡该源正文默认拼接15条评论
by 酷安 @viviyaaa    分享注明出处

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
<js>

try{last=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/chapterList?novelId='+baseUrl.match(/(\d+)/)[1])).chapterlist;
$=last[last.length-1];
vip=$.isvip?'💰':'';
chapterid=$.chapterid;
chaptername=$.chaptername;
date=$.chapterdate;
vip+chapterid+'、'+chaptername+' '+date}
catch(err){
java.log(err)
result="请刷新"
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
var javaImport = new JavaImporter(); javaImport.importPackage( Packages.java.lang, Packages.javax.crypto.spec, Packages.javax.crypto, Packages.java.util ); with(javaImport){ let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b"); let ALGORITHM = "DES"; let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding"; let CHARSET = "utf-8"; let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN"); function decode(data){ let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes()); let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES"); let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks); let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM); let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET)); cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv); return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET); } } //DES解密结束 intro=java.get("intro"); intro=intro!=""?"◎"+intro+"◎
":""; content=java.getElement("$.content"); saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n◎作者有话要说：\n"+saybody:""; if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){ result=intro+String(decode(content)+say); }else{result=intro+content+say} //获取评论开启 if(!baseUrl.match(/baidu/)){ //匹配书籍id跟章节id bid=baseUrl.match(/novelId=(\d+)/)[1]; cid=baseUrl.match(/chapterId=(\d+)/)[1]; //拼接评论url url="https://s8-static.jjwxc.net/comment_json.php?novelid="+bid+"&chapterid="+cid; //获取评论列表 list=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).body; comment=""; //判断评论数量 len=list.length>15?15:list.length; for(i=0;i
ruleContent.replaceRegex:
##【普通用户、初级.*用户所发评论将在审核通过后显示！】|【为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*
|(感谢灌溉)[\w\W]+(.).*感谢(灌|投|支持).*|感谢(在|为).*小天使.*|.*(扔|投|砸|灌)了.*时间.*|.*\d瓶.*|.*(扔|投|砸|灌|谢).*(手榴弹|营养液|地雷|浅水炸弹|深水炸弹|深水鱼雷|火箭炮|投雷|霸王票).*|非常感谢.*努力的.*

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
java.put("intro",intro);
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1';
num=!type?'第{{$.chapterid}}章 ':'';
if(title.match(/[一二三四五六七八九十百千万\d]+\s*章|^\d+[、\.\s]|chapter\s*\d+/i)){
num=''
}else{num=num}
l=lock?'[锁]':'';
result=num+title+l;

//不显示卷名
result=!type?result:'';
</js>

header:
<js>
var Proxy = source.getLoginInfoMap()["代理："] ? source.getLoginInfoMap()["代理："].split(",") : [];
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/55.0.2883.87 UBrowser/6.2.4094.1 Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

result?result:'无法获取内容？
1.编辑书源添加自己的账号信息，找到目录列表规则，按提示添加账号信息
2.如果添加了账号信息仍然无法获取内容，请尝试刷新或更新账号信息（方式二）
3.必要说明：如果使用方式一添加了账号信息，每次打开新的书籍详情页或刷新正文都会重新获取账号信息，因此之前获取的书籍正文的链接将会失效，因此建议全文下载或者按2操作
必要说明：在使用本源前，请考虑到使用本源可能造成的账号封禁等问题'

ruleContent.content:
<js>
jms=JSON.parse(result);
jm=String(jms.body.content).split("a2o@");
function formatSeconds(value) { 
var theTime = parseInt(value);// 秒 
var theTime1 = 0;// 分 
var theTime2 = 0;// 小时 
if(theTime > 60) { 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime/60); 
theTime = parseInt(theTime%60); 
if(theTime1 > 60) { 
theTime2 = parseInt(theTime1/60); 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime1%60); } } 
var result = ""+parseInt(theTime)+"秒"; 
if(theTime1 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime1)+"分"+result; } 
if(theTime2 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime2)+"小时"+result; } 
return result; } 
if(jm.length>1){
key="S3VqaWFuZ0FwcDc0NzYwNQ==";
iv=jm[0];
data=jm[1];
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);
with(javaImport) {
    function decode(content) {
        decode = Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(content));
             byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
             byteArrayInputStream = new ByteArrayInputStream(decode);
            gZIPInputStream = new GZIPInputStream(byteArrayInputStream);
            bArr = String(" ").getBytes(); 
            while (true) {
                read = gZIPInputStream.read(bArr);
                if (read > 0) {
                    byteArrayOutputStream.write(bArr, 0, read);
                } else {
                    gZIPInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayOutputStream.close();
                    return byteArrayOutputStream.toString();
                }
          }
    }
}

decode(java.aesBase64DecodeToString(data,java.base64Decode(key),"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",java.base64Decode(iv)))}
else{"新章节需要解封\n"+"解锁时间还需："+formatSeconds(String(jms.body.left_seconds))}
</js>
